author: The Telegraph
title: Exclusive Book Offer
text: Telegraph readers can save an exclusive 30% on a selection of title from Antonio Carluccio (RRP £9.99 - £25.00). Pasta: The Essential New Collection from the Master of Italian Cookery – only £13.99 (RRP: £20.00) At last, the ultimate book on pasta from the master of Italian cookery! In his exciting new book, Antonio Carluccio shares his love of Italy's favourite food, providing innovative and exciting recipes for soups, main courses, salads and even desserts. Over 100 inspirational recipes for both fresh and dried pasta range from the simple and traditional to the truly unusual and luxurious. Also featured is a wealth of ideas for varying the basic recipe to produce numerous different dishes, according to taste and seasonal availability. Click here to save 30% on Pasta: The Essential New Collection from the Master of Italian Cookery. Antonio Carluccio: The Collection – only £16.99 (RRP: £25.00) Capturing Antonio's simple, joyful and no-fuss approach to cooking, this exceptional book, with over 300 of his best recipes, provides a unique culinary journey covering every aspect of the Italian meal from antipasti to dolci and featuring mouthwatering dishes from each of Italy's distinct culinary regions. Click here to save 30% on Antonio Carluccio: The Collection . Antonio Carluccio's Simple Cooking – only £6.99 (RRP: £9.99) Antonio Carluccio's Simple Cooking is a coming together of all the 'secrets' that Antonio has learned over his many years of cooking. Packed with easy, reliable and delicious dishes, it is the perfect cookbook for the novice and enthusiast alike.
